TERMS.FIRST: By signing up you agree to our

EDIT_WORKSPACE.TITLE: Edit workspace
EDIT_WORKSPACE.DESC: Here you can change the name of the workspace and its icon.

DATA.INFO: Changing the color only affects the appearance of the workspace icon only when no image has been added

DELETE.TITLE: Delete the workspace
DELETE.DESC: Once a workspace and the data belonging to it are deleted, there is no way to recover them.
DELETE.LABEL: CONFIRM WORKSPACE NAME

DIALOG.TITLE: Delete the workspace
DIALOG.DESC: All data will be permanently deleted, and all users belonging to this workspace will lose access to it
DIALOG.WARNING: Deletion of workspace is permanent and cannot be undone, click „Delete workspace” to delete the workspace

MEMBERS.TITLE: Members
MEMBERS.DESC: Here you can manage the members of the workspace. You can change their roles as well as remove them from the workspace.

REMOVE.TITLE: Remove from workspace
REMOVE.NOTE: You can invite this user to this workspace again at any time. To confirm click „Remove from workspace”

SECOND_STEP.TITLE: How will you use
SECOND_STEP.INFO: We use this information to personalize your experience.

INVITE.TITLE: Invite to
INVITE.DESC: Copy the invitation link and send it to the people you want to invite to this workspace. You can set up roles and generate a new link.

LEAVE_FROM_WORKSAPCE.TITLE: Leave
LEAVE_FROM_WORKSAPCE.DESC: You can leave the workspace at any time and return to it whenever you're invited back.
LEAVE_FROM_WORKSAPCE.WARNING: All tasks and mind maps from this workspace that have been added to the “Starred” tab will be removed from it. The same applies to activities assigned to you.

ERRORS.DEFAULT: Oh no.. Something went wrong. Please try again
ERRORS.TAKEN_EMAIL: This email is already in use
ERRORS.DB_ERROR: We are currently having problems. Please try again later
ERRORS.WRONG_DATA: The data you provided is incorrect. Please provide the correct ones
ERRORS.NO_USER: User was not found. Please enter a valid email
ERRORS.WRONG_PASSWORD: The entered password is incorrect. Please enter the correct one
ERRORS.UPLOAD_FAILE: Failed to upload your file. Please try again
ERRORS.IMAGE_PROFILE_UPDATE: Failed to update your profile image. Please try again
ERRORS.IMAGE_PROFILE_DELETE: Failed to delete your profile image. Please try again
ERRORS.WORKSPACE_ICON_ADDED: Failed to add workscape icon. Please try again
ERRORS.NO_PASSWORD: Unable to update password. Read the warning
ERRORS.PASSWORD_DISMATCH: The current password you entered is incorrect
ERRORS.SAME_NAME_WORKSPACE: The workspace with the given name already exists
ERRORS.TOO_MANY_WORKSPACES: The limit on the number of workspaces that can be created has been reached
ERRORS.NO_PERMISSION: You don't have perrmios for this acction
ERRORS.WRONG_WORKSPACE_NAME: Please provide the correct name of the workspace
ERRORS.THE_SAME_TAG: A tag with this name already exists
ERRORS.IMAGE_TO_EDITOR: Nie udało się dodać zdjęcia, Spróbuj ponownie
ERRORS.CANT_LEAVE: Owner of workspace cannot leave from worksapce. You have to delete workspace from settings page

SUCCES.IMAGE_PROFILE_UPDATE: Your profile image has been updated!
SUCCES.IMAGE_PROFILE_DELETE: Your profile image has been deleted!
SUCCES.WORKSPACE_PICTURE_UPDATED: The workspace icon has been updated!
SUCCES.WORKSPACE_PICTURE_DELETED: The workspace icon has been removed

PASSWORD.MIN: Password must have at least 6 characters
PASSWORD.UPPERCASE: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
PASSWORD.LOWERCASE: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
PASSWORD.DIGIT: Password must contain at least one digit
PASSWORD.THE_SAME: New password cannot be the same as your current password

USERNAME.SPECIAL_CHARS: Username must only contain letters and digits

WORKSPACE.SPECIAL_CHARS: Workspace name must only contain letters and digits
WORKSPACE.WRONG_NAME: The given name is different from the name of the workspace

SCHEMA.CHOOSE_ONE: Please select one of the options

MAIN.NEW_WORKSAPCE_DIALOG_DESC: Remember that you can have a maximum of 5 active workspaces at the same time.

THEME.TITLE: Theme
THEME.DESC: Select how you would like your interface to look. Select theme from dark, light or system.

ACCOUNT.TITLE: Account
ACCOUNT.DESC: Manage your StudyFlow account. All changes to your account will be applied to all workspaces.
ACCOUNT.DELETE_DESC: Once the account and data are deleted, there is no way to recover them.

DIALOG.TITLE: Delete account
DIALOG.DESC: You will lose access to all your workspaces and projects
DIALOG.WARNING: Account deletion is permanent and cannot be undone, click „Delete my account” to delete your account.

SECURITY.TITLE: Security
SECURITY.DESC: You can change your password here. Remember that it should contain at least 6 characters, at least one upper and lower case letter and at least one number.

WARNING.SECOND: only for accounts created through the form on the site
WARNING.THIRD: . If you have created an account via the Google or Github button,
WARNING.FOURTH: it is not possible to change the password
WARNING.FIFTH: due to another method of account authorization.

ADMIN.TITLE: Admin
ADMIN.DESC: It has all possible rights, including to change the settings of the workspace and to manage other users.

EDITOR.TITLE: Editor
EDITOR.DESC: He has full access to the workspace and has rights to edit and delete content in the workspace. However, he does not have access to the settings of the area.

VIEWER.TITLE: Viewer
VIEWER.DESC: He has full access to the workspace, but cannot edit or delete anything. He also does not have access to the area settings.

DATE.INFO: If you select a date, the task will be added to your calendar

IMAGE.TITLE: Add image
IMAGE.DESC: You can add a photo by providing a link to it or you can import it from your device.

DIALOG.TITLE: Delete task
DIALOG.DESC: Are you sure you want to delete this note? You will lose all the data it contains and the activities associated with it. Deletion is irreversible

ASSIGNMENT.ERROR_MSG: Something went wrong, please try again
ASSIGNMENT.HEADING: ASSIGN TO

MIND_MAP.TAG: Add a tag to the mind map

DIALOG.TITLE: Delete all tiles
DIALOG.DESC: Reset the mind map layout to its initial state
DIALOG.WARNING: Restoring the initial state will delete all current tiles and connections. Click 'Reset State' to remove all tiles and connections.

EDGE_OPTIONS.TITLE: Connection Settings
EDGE_OPTIONS.DESC: Customize how your connections look. Add text, set connection type, change color, and choose whether to animate them!

LABEL.LABEL: Label
LABEL.DESC: Adding text will display a label. Leave the field empty and save changes to remove it.

COLOR.LABEL: Color
COLOR.DESC: Color choice affects only the label

EDIT_TILT_AND_EMOJI.TITLE: Edit information
EDIT_TILT_AND_EMOJI.DESC: Change the name of your mind map and set its icon

PREVIEW.INFO: This is the preview page. You can navigate the map space, but to edit it, go to the editing page (if you have the necessary permissions).

DIALOG.TITLE: Delete mind map
DIALOG.DESC: Are you sure you want to delete the mind map? You will lose all the data and associated actions. Deletion is irreversible.

ASSIGNMENT.ERROR_MSG: Something went wrong, please try again
ASSIGNMENT.HEADING: ASSIGN TO

CARD.TITLE: Pomodoro Settings
CARD.DESC: Manage your settings. Personalize your Pomodoro as you wish. You can change the number of rounds, work and break durations, as well as customize notification sounds.

WORK.LABEL: Work duration: {value} minutes
WORK.DESC: Set the duration of your work

SHORT_BREAK.LABEL: Short break duration: {value} minutes
SHORT_BREAK.DESC: Set the duration of your short break

LONG_BREAK.LABEL: Long break duration: {value} minutes
LONG_BREAK.DESC: Set the duration of your long break

ROUNDS.LABEL: Number of rounds: {value}
ROUNDS.DESC: Set how many rounds complete a full session (one round ends after the long break time elapses)

LONG_BREAKS_INTERVAL.LABEL: Interval between long breaks: {value}
LONG_BREAKS_INTERVAL.DESC: The larger the value, the longer one round lasts (greater interval between long breaks)

ALARM.LABEL: Notification sound
ALARM.DESC: Choose the sound to play when the time is up

VOLUME.LABEL: Notification sound volume: {value}%
VOLUME.DESC: To mute the notification, set the volume to 0%

STARRED.TITLE: Your starred items
STARRED.DESC: Here you will find all your saved mind maps and tasks.
STARRED.ERROR: An error occurred while retrieving your data. Please try again.

NO_ITEMS.TITLE: You have no projects marked with a star
NO_ITEMS.DESC: Any task or mind map you star will appear here.

ASSIGNED_TO_ME.TITLE: Assigned to Me
ASSIGNED_TO_ME.DESC: Here you will find all your saved mind maps and tasks
ASSIGNED_TO_ME.NO_ASSIGMENT: You haven't been assigned anywhere yet
ASSIGNED_TO_ME.NOT_FOUND: We couldn't find any tasks or mind maps that met the criteria

SHOW_MORE.TITLE: All tasks
SHOW_MORE.DESC: All tasks from workspaces you belong to

TASK_SHORTCUT.TITLE: Create Task
TASK_SHORTCUT.ADDED_TASK: Task added to project! View Task
TASK_SHORTCUT.DESC: Add a task to the selected workspace you belong to and have the required permissions in

MAIN_TAB.WARNING: You don't have any workspaces yet where you can add a task. Create a new workspace or join an existing workspace with at least “Editor” level permission.

PERMISSION_INDICATOR.TITLE: Your current role is
PERMISSION_INDICATOR.DESC: Your permissions in workspace {workspace} are currently

ROLES_DESC.OWNER: As the Owner, you have all possible rights. You can manage content, other users, and customize workspace settings. However, as the Owner, you cannot leave this workspace; the only option is to completely delete it in the settings.
ROLES_DESC.ADMIN: As an Admin, you have all possible rights, including changing workspace settings and managing other users.
ROLES_DESC.CAN_EDIT: As an Editor, you have full access to the workspace, with rights to edit and delete content within the workspace. However, you do not have access to workspace settings.
ROLES_DESC.READ_ONLY: As a Viewer, you have full access to the workspace but do not have permissions to edit the content within it. You also do not have access to workspace settings.

ERROR.MG: Failed to retrieve workspace members information
